description:

🏆Finally, a real 3D casino🏆

🌟Play Vegas Tower Slots and enjoy:

Best Realistic Classic Slots
Are you tired of trying games with the same visuals and design? In Vegas Tower Slots you will enjoy an complete different experience! 100% realistic, 100% 3D!

If you are a classic slots fan of Las Vegas, you will love Vegas Tower Slots. You will find slots machines with retro style across different rooms, video slots and other games like Keno, Wheel of Fortune or either a huge slot machine, just like in Las Vegas!

Lucky Wheel and Giant Slot Machine Bonus
Inspired by the real ones in Las Vegas, the Lucky Wheel and the Giant Slot Machine will increase your chances to win big thanks to their daily and hourly bonuses that will allow you to keep playing all the casino games. Play several days in a row to increase your prize!

Casino VIP benefits to win more
As long you play on any slot game tasks, you will receive VIP casino points that will allow you to win more on Tournaments and Bonuses. Also, all your purchases will reward you with much more VIP casino points.

Video Poker machines
Three video poker machines are waiting for you in the top floor! Jacks or Better, Deuces Wild & Ultimate Bonus Poker. Enjoy the retro style of these mytical video poker games.

3D Keno game machine
If you stay wanting more, try the Keno game machine! Find out how lucky you are playing Keno anytime you want and prepare to get huge wins! Simply place your bet then choose 10 numbers and then press the Start button. Easy and a new way to try your luck!

Download now and start your 100 Free Spins!!!

The games are intended for an adult audience. The games do not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling.
